movies.title: Traumfrauen
movies.plot: The story of three young women, and one older one (the mother of two of the others), who are looking for love and romance.
movies.simplePlot: The story of three young women, and one older one (the mother of two of the others), who are looking for love and romance.

biography.bio: Hannah Herzsprung was born on September 7, 1981 in Hamburg, West Germany as Hannah-Rebecca Herzsprung. She is an actress, known for The Reader (2008), Quatre minutes (2006) and Who Am I (2014).
biography.name: Hannah Herzsprung

biography.bio: Karoline Herfurth was born on May 22, 1984 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress and director, known for Un prof pas comme les autres (2013), The Reader (2008) and Le parfum - Histoire d'un meurtrier (2006).
biography.name: Karoline Herfurth

biography.placeOfBirth: Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR [now St. Petersburg, Russia]
biography.bio: Palina Rojinski was born on April 21, 1985 in Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR. She is an actress, known for Circus Halligalli (2013), Was wäre wenn? (2014) and Traumfrauen (2015).
biography.name: Palina Rojinski

biography.bio: Iris Berben was born on August 12, 1950 in Detmold, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Rosa Roth (1994), Eddie the Eagle (2016) and Noces d'argent (2006).
biography.name: Iris Berben

biography.bio: Elyas M'Barek was born on May 29, 1982 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for Un prof pas comme les autres (2013), Who Am I (2014) and The Wave (2008).
biography.name: Elyas M'Barek

biography.bio: Frederick Lau is a German actor. He was born and raised in Steglitz, Berlin, Germany, and still lives there. He played in over 50 roles since 2000. In 2008 he won the Deutscher Filmpreis award (Lola) for best male role for being Tim Stoltefuss in "Die Welle". He is also known for portraying Wurstjunge in "Die Snobs".
biography.name: Frederick Lau

biography.bio: Doron Amit was born on April 29, 1982 in Israel. He is an actor, known for Hanna's Journey (2013), Traumfrauen (2015) and Zaytoun (2012).
biography.name: Doron Amit

biography.placeOfBirth: Kwassitz, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia [now Kvasice, Moravia, Czech Republic]
biography.birthName: Friedrich Ernst Peter Paul Maria Graf von Thun und Hohenstein
biography.bio: Friedrich von Thun was born on June 30, 1942 in Kwassitz, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia as Friedrich Ernst Peter Paul Maria Graf von Thun und Hohenstein. He is an actor and director, known for Schindler's List (1993), Hitler - La naissance du mal (2003) and Amen (2002). He was previously married to Gabriele (Gaby) Schniewind and Gabriele (Yella) Bleyler.
biography.name: Friedrich von Thun

biography.bio: Margarita Broich was born on May 3, 1960 in Neuwied, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. She is an actress, known for The Reader (2008), Twin Sisters (2002) and Back to Your Arms (2010).
biography.name: Margarita Broich

biography.birthName: Maximilian Romedio Johann-Ernst Graf von Thun und Hohenstein
biography.bio: Max von Thun was born on February 21, 1977 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany as Maximilian Romedio Johann-Ernst Graf von Thun und Hohenstein. He is an actor, known for The Crown Prince (2006), Der Sommer der Gaukler (2011) and Ein Geheimnis im Dorf - Schwester und Bruder (2016).
biography.name: Max von Thun

biography.bio: Dejan Bucin was born on April 23, 1985 in Belgrade, Serbia. He is known for his work on La belle et la bête (2014), Jeux de rôles (2011) and Samira (2016).
biography.name: Dejan Bucin

biography.bio: Nina Proll was born on January 12, 1974 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Banlieue nord (1999), Rabbit Without Ears (2007) and Falling (2006). She has been married to Gregor Bloéb since July 5, 2008. They have one child.
biography.name: Nina Proll

biography.bio: Alexander Schubert was born in 1970 in Potsdam, German Democratic Republic. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Heute Show (2009), CIS: Chaoten im Sondereinsatz (2010) and Le paradis du mac (2002).
biography.name: Alexander Schubert

biography.bio: Nic Romm was born in 1974 in Montreal, Québec, Canada as Nicolas Hardy Romm. He is an actor, known for Vic le Viking (2009), Vic le viking 2: Le marteau de thor (2011) and Nous sommes la nuit (2010).
biography.name: Nic Romm

biography.bio: Christian Berkel was born on October 28, 1957 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Inglourious Basterds (2009), Downfall (2004) and The Experiment (2001).
biography.name: Christian Berkel

categories.category: Best Actress in a Comedy Role (Beste Schauspielerin in einer komödiantischen Rolle)
